name: My Super Tower 3
description: My Super Tower III is a classic Tower Defense strategy game with a nice bright Low Poly graphics and classic casual gameplay & medieval thematic.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: 1.2GHz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 5.0 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse
